text: Patricia Smith "Patsy" Ticer (January 6, 1935 â€“ August 7, 2017) was an American politician. She was born in Alexandria, Virginia. She was a member of the Democratic Party.Reed Morwaski, Bridget, (August 7, 2017).Pasty Ticer, four-term Virginia state senator, dies at age 82, The Washington Post, Retrieved August 8, 2017. Ticer served on the City Council of Alexandria, Virginia in the 1980s. She then served as Mayor of Alexandria from 1991 to 1996. Ticer served in the Senate of Virginia from 1996 until her retirement in 2011. Ticer died in a hospital in Alexandria, Virginia from complications from a fall on August 7, 2017 at the age of 82.Former Alexandria Mayor, state senator Patsy Ticer dies ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:American mayors Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Alexandria, Virginia
title: Patsy Ticer
